name: ax-frege52a
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3
body: |- wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(wif(w0, w2, w3), wif(w1, w2, w3)))
comment: The case when the content of ` ph ` is identical with the content of ` ps ` and in which a proposition controlled by an element for which we substitute the content of ` ph ` is affirmed (in this specific case the identity logical function) and the same proposition, this time where we substituted the content of ` ps ` , is denied does not take place. Part of Axiom 52 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)
